[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [booleanConverter](../fast-element.booleanconverter/index.html)

## booleanConverter variable

A [ValueConverter](../fast-element.valueconverter/) that converts to and from `boolean` values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
booleanConverter: ValueConverter
```

## Remarks

Used automatically when the `boolean` [AttributeMode](../fast-element.attributemode/) is selected.
